game.name: Autofahrt
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A storm is gathering and devouring everything. Drive for your life alone or with friends and escape the deadly storm. Repair and keep your vehicle intact, it's the only way to reach the bunker and survive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A storm is gathering and devouring everything. Drive for your life alone or with friends and escape the deadly storm. Repair and keep your vehicle intact, it's the only way to reach the bunker and survive.
